author: MohitS704
body: A version of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/46856, but for a CMSSW compatible with slc7. This is for the re-production of Run 2 Monte Carlo sometime in the future. As such, the MCMultiParticleMassFilter needs to be backported from el9 to slc7 as well.
title: backporting to an slc7 CMSSW
